description: This file defines a function to create and retrieve a singleton Supabase client instance configured via environment variables. It is used to initialize a Supabase client with public configuration from environment variables, ensuring only one instance exists during runtime.

methods.name: getSupabaseClient()
methods.description: Returns a singleton instance of the Supabase client configured with environment variables REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL and REACT_APP_SUPABASE_KEY. If the client does not exist, it initializes it and stores it in the global window object.
